item.title: Better Understanding of Linear Regression
Better Understanding of AI Search Algorithms
item.description: Created by the Author with Copilot Table of Contents Link to heading Main Idea Types of AI Search Algorithms Uninformed Search Algorithms Depth-First Search (DFS) Breadth-First Search (BFS) Depth-Limited Search (DLS) Iterative Deepening DFS (ID-DFS) Uniform Cost Search (UCS) Main Idea Link to heading Let us imagine that Engineers do not yet implement these kinds of algorithms, and we have to think about modeling a life problem into a graph that represents all the states that this problem could be in.
